issues.title: Login Issue
issues.description: Unable to login to my company email. It shows wrong password.

issues.title: API Timeout Error
issues.description: The API times out when fetching user details after 30 seconds.

issues.title: UI Layout Glitch
issues.description: The page layout breaks on smaller screens, especially for the dashboard.

issues.title: Database Connection Failure
issues.description: Failed to connect to the production database on the staging server.

issues.title: Password Reset Email Not Sending
issues.description: Password reset email is not being delivered to the user inbox.

issues.title: Slow Page Load Time
issues.description: Pages are taking over 5 seconds to load. Needs optimization.

issues.title: CSS Styling Issue
issues.description: The button colors on mobile view are not aligning correctly.

issues.title: 404 Page Not Found Error
issues.description: User encounters a 404 error when accessing the resources page.

issues.title: Email Signature Not Rendering
issues.description: The email signature is not being displayed properly on sent emails.

issues.title: Error in Payment Gateway
issues.description: Users are unable to complete transactions due to an error with the payment gateway.
